Donald Rumsfeld asserts that Bush exacerbated matters by allowing confusion in the chain of command and enabling Paul Bremer to "pick and choose" which senior Washington officials to deal with. proposal intended to incite a panicked response to a phony crisis," Bill Lockyer , a Democrat, said during a conference call with reporters organized by the Economic Policy Institute, a Washington, D.C., think tank. Killer bees, space aliens... now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states. The truth is, no state wants to declare bankruptcy, no state needs to declare bankruptcy, and no state would. Julia Angwin talks to Lauren Goode about the surprise change atop the internet giant. In a nod to how he was regarded as Google Inc. 's elder statesman, Mr. Eric Schmidt tweeted wryly after the management shifts were announced, Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! In the decade since Mr. Eric Schmidt joined Google Inc. , the company blew by competitors such as Microsoft Corp. in the search-ad business. " said Mike Pence in a speech on the House floor. "It would ensure that abortion providers are not subsidized with federal tax dollars." "Now, let me say," Mike Pence continued, to be very clear, Mr. Speaker, this legislation does not cut one penny from title X family planning funding. I applaud much of the important work that is done at title X clinics across this country: breast cancer screening, HIV protection, education, counseling, pregnancy diagnosis. This legislation simply prevents family planning funding from aiding organizations that profit from the abortion industry.
